title: WATCH: Liverpool v Tottenham greatest goals
description: We take a look at some of the best goals between Liverpool and Tottenham from the Premier League era.
content: Ahead of the two sides' meeting on Nissan Super Sunday, live on Sky Sports Premier League from 4.30pm, we've compiled the very best strikes from recent years, with five from each side.Liverpool are looking to get revenge on Spurs at Anfield following their 4-1 defeat at Wembley earlier this season, with the Reds sat in third in the Premier League table, two points above their fifth-placed opponents.Sit back and enjoy the following goals in the video above...Watch Liverpool v Tottenham on Super Sunday at 4.30pm, on Sky Sports Premier League.
